titleStmt.title: A free flowing of the father's love to the heirs of the kingdom, with all that are seeking the peace and righteousness of it
titleStmt.author: Smith, William, d. 1673.

notesStmt.note: At end of sheet: "Your dear Brother in bonds, W.S. The beginning of the 7th month, 1664. This is to go amongst Friends, and to be read in their Meetings."
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England)
